name: Dungeonlite Duelers
storyline: In time, the Syndicate will reveal all. Until then, stay vigilant.
summary: Dungeonlite Duelers is a new take on the battle royale genre that combines frenetic multiplayer action with the depth of dungeon crawling rogue-likes. It's simple to pick up but hard to master, with limitless builds and spell combos to learn and perfect. Never has outplaying your opponent felt this good!
